_sText:
trikz_addict_final : 

"First, it isn't trikz_addicted ,that's one is a bad version, so please delete it from your server"

I make easy map because many mapper make hard map only for their teams , but a lot of player are medium or noob lol . and many of them don't like hard map .. 

I created this final version because I don't like the other
I fixed some bugs, every block respawn, maked music in disco, maked a secret room, I deleted the XC, and created 3 levels and more :p.
I fixed textures

( Sorry if my English isn't correct , I'm french ^^ )

Please don't forget to delete trikz_addicted and put trikz_addict_final on your server.
If you have suggestion for me ..coment :)

So download, and enjoy :D <3

** PS : Look at "Soulja" and "disco ball" in the disco when the music stop at 2.45min so 165seconds after the music starts ! ;) ! **
